Summaryinfo.ReportComments: NB: Boyum IT A/S does not perform any support on modification of this layout.

Table.Name: Command
Table.Command:
DECLARE @ObjectType INT DECLARE @DocEntry INT DECLARE @LineNum INT SET @ObjectType = {?SupBatchBaseType} SET @DocEntry = {?SupBatchBaseEntry} SET @LineNum = {?SupBatchBaseLine}
SELECT TS2.DistNumber AS BatchNum, ABS(TS1.Quantity) AS Quantity, TS2.ExpDate FROM OITL TS0 JOIN ITL1 TS1 ON TS1.LogEntry = TS0.LogEntry JOIN OBTN TS2 ON TS2.Itemcode = TS1.ItemCode AND TS2.AbsEntry = TS1.MdAbsEntry WHERE @DocEntry = TS0.ApplyEntry AND @LineNum = TS0.ApplyLine AND @ObjectType = TS0.ApplyType AND TS0.DefinedQty <> 0

Table.Name: Command
Table.Command: DECLARE @ObjectType INT DECLARE @DocEntry INT DECLARE @LineNum INT SET @ObjectType = {?SupSerialNumberBaseType} SET @DocEntry = {?SupSerialNumberBaseEntry} SET @LineNum = {?SupSerialNumberBaseLine} SELECT TS2.DistNumber AS IntrSerial, TS2.MnfSerial AS SuppSerial, TS2.ExpDate FROM OITL TS0 JOIN ITL1 TS1 ON TS1.LogEntry = TS0.LogEntry JOIN OSRN TS2 ON TS2.Itemcode = TS1.ItemCode AND TS2.AbsEntry = TS1.MdAbsEntry WHERE @DocEntry = TS0.ApplyEntry AND @LineNum = TS0.ApplyLine AND @ObjectType = TS0.ApplyType AND TS0.DefinedQty <> 0

Table.Name: Command
Table.Command:
/* DECLARATIONS - BEGIN (DO NOT CHANGE) */ DECLARE @docEntry AS INT DECLARE @objectId AS NVARCHAR(20) SET @objectId = {?ObjectId@} SET @docEntry = {?DocKey@}
DECLARE @table AS VARCHAR(20) SELECT @table = CASE @objectId WHEN '23' THEN 'OQUT' WHEN '17' THEN 'ORDR' WHEN '16' THEN 'ORDN' WHEN '15' THEN 'ODLN' WHEN '13' THEN 'OINV' WHEN '14' THEN 'ORIN' WHEN '203' THEN 'ODPI' WHEN '22' THEN 'OPOR' WHEN '21' THEN 'ORPD' WHEN '20' THEN 'OPDN' WHEN '18' THEN 'OPCH' WHEN '19' THEN 'ORPC' WHEN '204' THEN 'ODPO' WHEN '540000006' THEN 'OPQT' WHEN '1470000113' THEN 'OPRQ' WHEN '234000031' THEN 'ORRR' WHEN '234000032' THEN 'OPRR' END /* DECLARATIONS - END */
/* SELECTION - BEGIN (ADD FIELDS AS NEEDED) T0 = Header T1 = Business Partner T2 = DocumentSeries T3 = Project T4 = ShippingType T5 = SalesEmployee (Header) T6 = Employee (Owner) T7 = Contact Person T8 = Dunning Term T9 = Payment Term */ EXEC ( 'SELECT T0.DocEntry, T0.DocNum, T0.DocType, T0.DocDate, T0.DocDueDate, T0.CardCode, T0.CardName, T0.Address, T0.NumAtCard, T0.VatSum, T0.VatSumFC, T0.DiscPrcnt, T0.DiscSum, T0.DiscSumFC, T0.DocCur, T0.DocTotal, T0.DocTotalFC, T0.Comments, T0.SlpCode, T0.TrnspCode, T0.CntctCode, T0.FatherCard, T0.FatherType, T0.TotalExpns, T0.TotalExpFC, T0.Address2, T0.ShipToCode, T0.LicTradNum, T0.PaymentRef, T0.Project, T0.DpmPrcnt, T0.PaidSum, T0.PaidSumFC, T0.Header, T0.Footer, T0.LangCode, T0.PayToCode,
T1.CardType,
T2.SeriesName,
T3.PrjName,
T4.TrnspName,
T5.SlpName,
T6.firstname AS Owner_FirstName, T6.middlename AS Owner_MiddleName, T6.lastname AS Owner_LastName, T6.sex AS Owner_Sex, T6.jobTitle AS Owner_JobTitle,
T7.Name AS ContactPerson_Name, T7.Position AS ContactPerson_Position, T7.Tel1 AS ContactPerson_Tel1, T7.Tel2 AS ContactPerson_Tel2, T7.Cellolar AS ContactPerson_Cellolar, T7.Fax AS ContactPerson_Fax, T7.E_MailL AS ContactPerson_EmailL, T7.Gender AS ContactPerson_Gender, T7.Profession AS ContactPerson_Profession, T7.Title AS ContactPerson_Title,
T8.TermName, T8.YearlyRate,
T9.PymntGroup,
ISNULL((SELECT TS1.Trans FROM OMLT TS0 LEFT JOIN MLT1 TS1 ON TS0.TranEntry = TS1.TranEntry WHERE TS0.FieldAlias = ''PymntGroup'' AND TS0.TableName = ''OCTG'' AND TS0.PK=T0.GroupNum AND TS1.LangCode = T0.LangCode), T9.PymntGroup) AS PymntGroupTranslated FROM '+@table+' T0 LEFT JOIN OCRD T1 ON T0.CardCode = T1.CardCode LEFT JOIN NNM1 T2 ON T0.ObjType = T2.ObjectCode AND T0.Series = T2.Series LEFT JOIN OPRJ T3 ON T0.Project = T3.PrjCode LEFT JOIN OSHP T4 ON T0.TrnspCode = T4.TrnspCode LEFT JOIN OSLP T5 ON T0.SlpCode = T5.SlpCode LEFT JOIN OHEM T6 ON T0.OwnerCode = T6.empId LEFT JOIN OCPR T7 ON T0.CntctCode = T7.CntctCode LEFT JOIN ODUT T8 ON T1.DunTerm = T8.TermCode LEFT JOIN OCTG T9 ON T0.GroupNum = T9.GroupNum WHERE T0.DocEntry = '+@docEntry) /* SELECTION - END */

Table.Name: Command
Command
Table.Command: SELECT ISNULL(T0.CompnyName,'') AS 'Name', ISNULL(T0.CompnyAddr,'') AS AddressFull, ISNULL(T1.Street,'') AS AddressStreet, ISNULL(T1.Block,'') AS AddressBlock, ISNULL(T1.City,'') AS AddressCity, ISNULL(T1.ZipCode,'') AS AddressZipCode, ISNULL(T1.County,'') AS AddressCounty, ISNULL(T1.State,'') AS AddressState, ISNULL(T0.Country,'') AS AddressCountry, ISNULL(T3.Name,'') AS AddressCountryName, ISNULL(T0.Phone1,'') AS Phone1, ISNULL(T0.Phone2,'') AS Phone2, ISNULL(T0.Fax,'') AS Fax, ISNULL(T0.E_Mail,'') AS Email, ISNULL(T0.Manager,'') AS Manager, ISNULL(T0.MainCurncy,'') AS LocalCurrency, ISNULL(T0.SysCurrncy,'') AS SystemCurrency, ISNULL(T0.TaxIdNum,'') AS FederalTaxId, ISNULL(T0.TaxIdNum2,'') AS FederalTaxId2, ISNULL(T0.TaxIdNum3,'') AS FederalTaxId3, ISNULL(T0.FreeZoneNo,'') AS AdditionalId, ISNULL(T0.RevOffice,'') AS TaxOffice, ISNULL(T0.CaredType,'') AS PayInFormType, ISNULL(T0.PBSNumber,'') AS PayInFormNumber, ISNULL(T0.PBSGroupNo,'') AS PayInFormGroupNumber, ISNULL(T1.IntrntAdrs,'') AS Website, ISNULL(T0.PrintHeadr,'') AS PrintHeader, ISNULL(T0.XmlPath,'') AS PathXml, ISNULL(T0.ExcelPath,'') AS PathExcel, ISNULL(T2.WordPath,'') AS PathWord, ISNULL(T2.BitmapPath,'') AS PathBitmap, ISNULL(T2.AttachPath,'') AS PathAttach, ISNULL(T2.ExtPath,'') AS PathExtension, ISNULL(T0.BankCountr,'') AS BankCountry, ISNULL(T0.DflBnkCode,'') AS BankCode, (SELECT ISNULL(TS0.BankName,'') FROM ODSC TS0 WHERE TS0.CountryCod = T0.BankCountr AND TS0.BankCode = T0.DflBnkCode) AS BankName, (SELECT ISNULL(TS0.SwiftNum,'') FROM ODSC TS0 WHERE TS0.CountryCod = T0.BankCountr AND TS0.BankCode = T0.DflBnkCode) AS BankSwift, (SELECT ISNULL(TS0.IBAN,'') FROM DSC1 TS0 WHERE TS0.Country = T0.BankCountr AND TS0.BankCode = T0.DflBnkCode AND TS0.Branch = T0.DflBranch AND TS0.Account = T0.DflBnkAcct) AS BankIban, (SELECT ISNULL(TS0.Street,'') FROM DSC1 TS0 WHERE TS0.Country = T0.BankCountr AND TS0.BankCode = T0.DflBnkCode AND TS0.Branch = T0.DflBranch AND TS0.Account = T0.DflBnkAcct) AS BankStreet, (SELECT ISNULL(TS0.Block,'') FROM DSC1 TS0 WHERE TS0.Country = T0.BankCountr AND TS0.BankCode = T0.DflBnkCode AND TS0.Branch = T0.DflBranch AND TS0.Account = T0.DflBnkAcct) AS BankBlock, (SELECT ISNULL(TS0.City,'') FROM DSC1 TS0 WHERE TS0.Country = T0.BankCountr AND TS0.BankCode = T0.DflBnkCode AND TS0.Branch = T0.DflBranch AND TS0.Account = T0.DflBnkAcct) AS BankCity, (SELECT ISNULL(TS0.County,'') FROM DSC1 TS0 WHERE TS0.Country = T0.BankCountr AND TS0.BankCode = T0.DflBnkCode AND TS0.Branch = T0.DflBranch AND TS0.Account = T0.DflBnkAcct) AS BankCounty, (SELECT ISNULL(TS0.State,'') FROM DSC1 TS0 WHERE TS0.Country = T0.BankCountr AND TS0.BankCode = T0.DflBnkCode AND TS0.Branch = T0.DflBranch AND TS0.Account = T0.DflBnkAcct) AS BankState, (SELECT ISNULL(TS0.ZipCode,'') FROM DSC1 TS0 WHERE TS0.Country = T0.BankCountr AND TS0.BankCode = T0.DflBnkCode AND TS0.Branch = T0.DflBranch AND TS0.Account = T0.DflBnkAcct) AS BankZipCode, ISNULL(T0.DflBnkAcct,'') AS BankAccount, ISNULL(T0.DflBranch,'') AS BankBranch, ISNULL(T0.HldCode,'') AS HolidayCode, ISNULL(T0.MultiLang,'') AS MultiLanguageSupport, ISNULL(T2.LogoFile,'') AS Logo FROM OADM T0 JOIN ADM1 T1 ON 1=1 JOIN OADP T2 ON 1=1 LEFT JOIN OCRY T3 ON T0.Country = T3.Code

FormulaFieldDefinitions.FormulaFieldDefinition: switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Faktura-adresse', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Fakturaadresse', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Rechnungsadresse', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Dirección de factura', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Laskutusosoite', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Factuuradres', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Adresse de facturation', True, 'Bill-to address' //Default English )

switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Leveringsadresse', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Leveringsadresse', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Lieferadresse', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Dirección de entrega', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Toimitusosoite', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Leveringsadres', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Adresse de livraison', True, 'Ship-to address' //Default English )

switch( {Header.CardType} = 'C', switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Kundenr.', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Kundenr.', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Kundennr.', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Número de cliente', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Asiakasnumero', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Klantnr.', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Numéro de client', True, 'Customer No.' //Default English ),
{Header.CardType} = 'S', switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Leverandørnr.', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Leverandørnr.', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Lieferantennr.', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Número de proveedor', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Toimittajanumero', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Leveranciersnr.', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Numéro du fournisseur', True, 'Supplier No.' //Default English ),
{Header.CardType} = 'L', switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Kundeemnenr.', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Prospect nr.', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Potentielle Kundennr.', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Núm. de cliente potencial', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Potentiaalisen kumppanin numero', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Prospect nr.', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Numéro de client potentiels', True, 'Lead No.' //Default English ) )

switch( {Header.CardType} = 'C', switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Kundenavn', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Kundenavn', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Kundenname', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Nombre de cliente', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Asiakkaan nimi', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Klantnaam', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Nom du client', True, 'Customer name' //Default English ),
{Header.CardType} = 'S', switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Leverandørnavn', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Leverandørnavn', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Lieferantenname', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Nombre de proveedor', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Toimittajan nimi', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Leveranciersnaam', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Nom du fournisseur', True, 'Supplier name' //Default English ),
{Header.CardType} = 'L', switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Kundeemne navn', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Prospect navn', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Potentieller Kundenname', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Nombre del cliente potencial', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Potentiaalisen kumppanin nimi', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Prospectnaam', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Nom du client potentiel', True, 'Lead name' //Default English ) )

switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Kontonr.', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Kontonr.', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Kontonummer', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Número de cuenta', {@X_Language} = 'Fi', 'Tilinumero', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Rekeningnummer', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Numéro de compte', True, 'Account' //Default English )

switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Bankadresse', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Bankadresse', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Bankanschrift', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Dirección de banco', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Pankin osoite', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Bankadres', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Adresse de la banque', True, 'Bank-address' //Default English )

switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Bogføringsdato', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Bokføringsdato', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Buchungsdatum', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Fecha contable', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Tositepvm', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Factuurdatum', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Date du document', True, 'Doc. date' //Default English )

switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Forudbetalings %', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Forskuddsbetaling %', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Vorauszahlungs %', {@X_Language} = 'ES', '% de pago anticipado', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Ennakkomaksu %', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Voorschot', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Acompte %', True, 'Down payment %' //Default English )

switch( {@X_Is_AR_Quotation}, switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Gyldig til', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Gyldig til', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Gültig bis', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Válido hasta', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Voimassaolon loppu', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Geldig tot', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Valable pour', True, 'Valid untill' ), {@X_Is_AP_Quotation}, switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Gyldig til', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Gyldig til', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Gültig bis', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Válido hasta', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Voimassaolon loppu', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Geldig tot', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Valable pour', True, 'Valid untill' ), {@X_Is_AR_Order} OR {@X_Is_AR_Delivery} OR {@X_Is_AP_Order}, switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Leveringsdato', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Leveringsdato', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Lieferdatum', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Fecha de entrega', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Toimituspäivämäärä', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Leveringsdatum', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Date de livraison', True, 'Delivery date' ), {@X_Is_AP_GoodsReturnRequest} OR {@X_Is_AR_ReturnRequest}, switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Returdato', True, 'Return Date' ), True, switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Forfaldsdato', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Forfallsdato', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Fälligkeitsdatum', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Fecha de vencimiento', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Eräpäivä', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Uiterste betaaldatum', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Date d`échéance', True, 'Due date' ) )

switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'EU-Moms nummer', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Org.nr', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'EU Ust-ID', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'EU NIF', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'ALV-numero', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'BTW-nr', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Numéro de TVA', True, 'Federal Tax Id' //Default English )

switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Konsolideringsadresse', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Konsolideringsadresse', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Konsolidierungsadresse', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Dirección de consolidación', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Konsolidointiosoite', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Consolidatieadres', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Adresse de consolidation', True, 'Delivery Consolidation address' //Default English )

switch( {Header.DocType} = 'I', switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Artikelnavn', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Varenavn', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Artikelbeschreibung', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Descripción de artículo', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Tuotteen nimi', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Artikelomschrijving', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Description de l`article', True, 'Item name' //Default English ), {Header.DocType} = 'S', switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Beskrivelse', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Beskrivelse', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Beschreibung', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Descripción', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Kuvaus', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Omschrijving', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Description', True, 'Description' //Default English ) )

switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Artikel', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Varenummer', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Artikel ', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Número de artículo', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Tuotenro', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Artikelnr.', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Numéro de l`article', True, 'Item no.' //Default English )

switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Pris efter moms', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Pris etter moms', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Preis nach MwSt.', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Precio (IVA inc.)', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Verollinen hinta', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Prijs exclusief BTW', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Prix ​​hors TVA', True, 'Price after VAT' //Default English )

switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Pris før rabat', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Pris før rabatt', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Preis vor Rabatt', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Precio antes del descuento', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Hinta ennen alennusta', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Prijs zonder korting', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Prix ​​avant réduction', True, 'Price before discount' //Default English )

switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Total', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Total', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Linie Gesamt', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Total de línea', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Yhteensä', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Totaal', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Total des', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Eenheid', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Unité', True, 'Total' //Default English )

switch( {?ObjectId@} = 23, switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Tilbudsnr.', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Tilbudsnr.', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Angebotsnr.', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Número de oferta', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Tarjousnumero', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Offertenr.', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Numéro cotation', True, 'Quotation No.' //Default English ),
{?ObjectId@} = 17, switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Ordrenr.', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Ordrenr.', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Auftragsnr.', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Número de pedido', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Tilausnumero', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Ordernr.', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Numéro de commande', True, 'Order No.' //Default English ),

{?ObjectId@} = 22, switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Indkøbsordre', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Innkjøpsordre', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Einkaufsauftrag', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Pedido', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Ostotilausnumero', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Inkoopordernr.', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Bon de commande', True, 'Purchase Order No.' //Default English ),

{?ObjectId@} = 21, switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Returnering', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Retur', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Retoure', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Devolución', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Palautusnumero', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Retournering.', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Retour', True, 'Goods Return no.' //Default English ),
{?ObjectId@} = 204, switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Forudbetalingsnr.', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Forskuddsbetaling', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Vorauszahlungs-Nr.', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Núm. de pago anticipo', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Ennakkolaskunumero', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Aanbetalingsnr.', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Acompte', True, 'Down Payment no.' //Default English ), {?ObjectId@} = 18, switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Fakturanr.', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Fakturanr.', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Rechnungs-Nr.', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Núm. de factura', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Laskunumero', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Factuurnr.', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Número de factura', True, 'Invoice No.' //Default English ),
